full_text: I'm so excited. Boss brought me tickets to come out + see my [REDACTED] almost every day. He is very wealthy + might help me get into or pay for college. I don't want to cut my losses up because I hate disappointment but it would be really cool if it happened + even if it doesn't it is so great I got to go see him.
